title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Beat the eggs with pecorino and parmesan.
Toss the pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Simmer the tomato sauce with spices and cream.
Add the chicken to the sauce and serve with rice.
